body_html:
I'm had the same error and added the cxx_flag: "-D_MWAITXINTRIN_H_INCLUDED lines to fix it. It worked but I then got another error message:

ERROR: /home/david/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/BUILD:1509:1: output 
'tensorflow/core/kernels/_objs/depth_space_ops_gpu/tensorflow/core/kernels/depthtospace_op_gpu.cu.o' was not created.

OS: Linux Mint 18
Compiler: gcc-4.9
CUDA: 7.5
CuDNN: 4.0.7

body:
I'm had the same error and added the `cxx_flag: "-D_MWAITXINTRIN_H_INCLUDED` lines to fix it. It worked but I then got another error message: 

```
ERROR: /home/david/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/BUILD:1509:1: output 
'tensorflow/core/kernels/_objs/depth_space_ops_gpu/tensorflow/core/kernels/depthtospace_op_gpu.cu.o' was not created.
```

OS: Linux Mint 18
Compiler: gcc-4.9
CUDA: 7.5
CuDNN: 4.0.7
